themes.name: AI Infrastructure Buildout
themes.description: Enterprise and cloud providers accelerating AI infrastructure investments; semiconductor, data center, and AI software companies benefiting from sustained capital allocation.

themes.name: Energy Transition and Sustainability
themes.description: Increased focus on renewable energy sources and sustainability initiatives driven by regulatory support and consumer demand; companies in solar, wind, and electric vehicles poised for growth.

themes.name: Healthcare Innovation and Biotech Advancements
themes.description: Continued investment in healthcare technology and biotech innovation, particularly in telehealth, personalized medicine, and AI-driven drug discovery, spurred by demographic shifts and regulatory changes.

themes.name: Infrastructure Spending Surge
themes.description: Government initiatives and private sector investments in infrastructure projects, including transportation, broadband, and utilities, driven by the need for modernization and economic stimulus.

themes.name: Consumer Behavior Shifts Post-Pandemic
themes.description: Changes in consumer spending patterns and preferences, with a focus on e-commerce, experiential retail, and health-conscious products, influencing various sectors including retail and consumer goods.

themes.name: Geopolitical Risk and Supply Chain Resilience
themes.description: Increased focus on supply chain resilience and diversification due to geopolitical tensions and trade policies; companies investing in domestic manufacturing and logistics solutions.

themes.name: Regulatory Changes Impacting Technology and Finance
themes.description: Evolving regulatory landscape affecting technology and financial sectors, including data privacy, antitrust actions, and cryptocurrency regulations, creating both challenges and opportunities.

themes.name: Labor Market Dynamics and Wage Growth
themes.description: Tight labor market leading to wage growth and changing employment dynamics, impacting consumer spending and corporate profitability across various sectors.
